thread.title: Jennifer Martin

author: Jennifer Martin
title: Jennifer Martin
text: Bravofly is terrible. Never book with them. I have been waiting for a refund and a voucher code that functions for 1.5 YEARS. This company has tereibel customer service and does not follow through with its promises. I call them and they always tell me I'll be contacted within 48 hours, which now I understand to mean NEVER. I have asked to speak to someone higher in the chain of command, and customer service reps just tell me they can't transfer me. This is crap and I am LIVID. They owe me a voucher and $4000 I had to spend on tickets I had already paid for. Get it together, BravoFly. YOU SUCK!
